summary: Monsieur Hulot visits the technology-driven world of his sister, brother-in-law, and nephew, but he can't quite fit into the surroundings.
cast: Jean-Pierre Zola|Adrienne Servantie|Lucien Frégis|Betty Schneider|Jean-François Martial|Dominique Marie|Yvonne Arnaud|Adelaide Danieli|Alain Bécourt|Régis Fontenay|Claude Badolle|Max Martel|Nicolas Bataille|Daki|Dominique Derly|André Dino|Suzanne Franck|Édouard Francomme|Michel Goyot|René Lord|Elsa Mancini|Jean Meyet|Denise Péronne|Nicole Regnault|Claire Rocca|Jean-Claude Rémoleux|Jacques Tati
title: Mi tío
